scheduleFive.matterDescription: Relating to defence and military:

subMatter.subMatterDescription: Protection of national unity and territorial integrity

scheduleFive.matterDescription: War and defence

Central planning, central bank, finance policies, monetary and banking, monetary policies, foreign grants, aid and loans

National transportation policies, management of railways and national highways
Laws relating to the Supreme Court, High Courts, District Courts and administration of justice
Citizenship, passport, visa, immigration

Intellectual property (including patents, designs, trademarks and copyrights)

Constitutional Bodies, commissions of national importance
Sites of archaeological importance and ancient monuments
Any matter not enumerated in the Lists of Federal Powers, State Powers and Local Level Powers or in the Concurrent List and any matter not specified in this Constitution and in the Federal laws
